definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: You want to have your goods shipped from Swatow to Osaka via HongKong, where they can be transshipped .
sentences.chinese: 你想通过香港把货从汕头运到大阪，在香港转船。

sentences.english: This then allows for direct shipments and eliminates transshipping of the product.
sentences.chinese: 这样就可以直接装船运送产品，而不需转船。

sentences.english: The goods wil, be transhippedkin Hong Kong.
No direct liner are available, we shall transship the goods to ensure timely delivery.
sentences.chinese: 为保证及时交货，如果没有直达班轮，我们将转船。

sentences.english: For example, "From Qingdao to Helsinki W/T (with transshipment) Hong Kong by Vessel".
sentences.chinese: 如“通过船运，从青岛经香港转船发往赫尔辛基”。

sentences.english: We don't have liners to China, we must transship the goods at Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有开往中国的航班，货物必须在悉尼转船。

sentences.english: So far as I know， there are risks of pilferage or damage to the goods during transshipment in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，在香港转船期间有货物被盗或损坏的风险。

sentences.english: The goods will be transshipped in Hong Kong.
On perusal, we find that transshipment and partial shipment are not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 在详阅后，我们发现不允许转船和分批装运。

sentences.english: On account of lack of direct steamer, please allow transhipment in your L/C.
sentences.chinese: 因为没有直达船，在你的信用证中请注明准许转船。

sentences.english: Please amend the L/C to read Partial shipments and transhipment allowed.
sentences.chinese: 请将信用证改削为许可分批装运和转船。

sentences.english: They are to be transshipped at Singapore and are expected to reach your port early next month.
sentences.chinese: 此货物将在新加坡转船，预定于下月到达你方港口。

sentences.english: Maybe you are right, but the goods are to be transshipped at New.
sentences.chinese: 可能您是对的，但货物要在纽约或旧金山转船。

sentences.english: The goods will be transhipped in Hong Kong.
If transshipment is allowed, the port of transshipment is marked.
sentences.chinese: 如果允许转船，应标明转运港。

sentences.english: There are risks of damage to the goods during transshipment.
sentences.chinese: 在转船期间有货物被损坏的风险。

definition: to charter a ship/to take a vessel on rent
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
to load sth onto a ship etc
